summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARC Tanzania Project Management System. Backend APIs working with 100% success rate after fixing minor task endpoint bug. Frontend fully functional with all role-based features, profit calculations, and responsive design working correctly.
passed_tests: Health check endpoint (100% success)
Authentication for all three roles (CEO: sadi@arc.com, Finance: maureen.bangu@ar-consurt-world.com, Operations: juma.h.kasele@gmail.com)
CEO Executive Dashboard with contract overview, profit summaries, and team performance
Dashboard statistics showing Total Contracts, Total Value, Target Profit (30%), Actual Profit
Profit Status indicators (Green: Actual ≥ Target, Orange: Below Target, Red: Loss)
Contract creation by Finance Officer with financial parameters
Auto-generated contract numbers in ARC-YEAR-XXXX format (ARC-2026-0005, etc.)
Auto profit calculation: Target = 30% × Contract Value, Actual = Value - (Staff Cost + Commission + Tax + Admin Fee + Overhead)
Operations Officer configuration of project execution (dates, type, duration)
Project Status auto-calculation (Pending → Active → Expired based on dates)
CEO role assignment functionality (assign Finance/Operations roles to team members)
Task Board with 4 Kanban columns (To Do, In Progress, Review, Done)
Task CRUD operations (create, update status, add comments)
Team Management with role-based access control
User management (CEO/Operations can create users, Finance cannot)
Activity logging system
Responsive design (Desktop 1920x1080, Tablet 768x1024, Mobile 390x844)
Light theme with ARC brand colors (red #B22222, gold #B8860B)
Navigation between all pages with role-based restrictions
Contract financial grid showing all cost breakdowns
Team performance tracking with completion rates
